title: Dover Reports Fourth Quarter and Full Year 2022 Results - PR Newswire
summary: Dover Corporation, a diversified global manufacturer, announced strong revenue growth and margin improvement in the fourth quarter of 2022, driven by rigorous execution and improving price-cost dynamics. The company expects to generate GAAP EPS in the range of $7.87 to $8.07 (adjusted EPS of $8.85 to $9.05) in 2023, based on full year revenue growth of 3% to 5%. Dover's strategy for superior through-cycle shareholder value creation remains unchanged: to combine solid and consistent growth above GDP, strong operational execution generating meaningful margin accretion over time, and value-added disciplined capital deployment.
product_or_process: e-commerce adoption, back-office consolidation, and SKU complexity reduction

title: Kohler Previews New 26kW Home Standby Generator and New Exclusive Colors at CES 2023 USA - English - USA ... - PR Web
summary: Kohler Co. is showcasing its new 26kW air-cooled home standby generator and 10 new exclusive colors at the Consumer Electronics Show. The new colors allow homeowners to customize their generators to match their homes' aesthetics, while the new generator is quieter, more powerful, and more durable than previous models. Kohler also highlights its partnership with Mossy Oak to offer camouflage patterns on select generators.

title: Kohler Co. Celebrates 150 Years of Bold Moves, Creativity, and Impact While Shaping the Next 150 Years of Its Iconic ... - PR Newswire
summary: Kohler Co., a 150-year-old company known for kitchen and bath products, is celebrating its anniversary with a focus on innovation, design, wellness, and sustainability. The company is launching new products and initiatives, including heritage color options for its iconic designs, a partnership with explorer Robert Swan using Kohler's renewable energy solutions, and an expansion of its home generator offerings to include color and pattern options. Kohler is also emphasizing its commitment to sustainability through its 'Believing in Better' strategy, which focuses on creating a better planet, communities, and lives.

title: Kohler Co. Appoints Laura Kohler as Company's First Chief Sustainability and DEI Officer - PR Newswire
summary: Kohler Co. has appointed Laura Kohler as its first Chief Sustainability and Diversity, Equity and Inclusion (DEI) Officer.  This appointment reflects the company's commitment to accelerating sustainability, social impact, and DEI across its global business groups and product portfolios. Laura will lead a team of experts focused on strengthening stakeholder relationships, developing environmentally friendly products and processes, and advocating on important industry and societal challenges.

title: Kohler Introduces New Wellness Brand, Sprig - PR Newswire
summary: Kohler Co. has launched Sprig, a new wellness brand focused on elevating everyday routines into self-care rituals. Sprig offers innovative shower infusion systems, bath bombs, and body & linen mists, all designed to enhance the shower experience with mood-matching aromas and premium skincare ingredients. The brand emphasizes the use of clean, natural, and premium ingredients in its products, which are free from toxins and subject to rigorous testing.

title: KOHLER PRESENTS HERITAGE COLORS - PR Newswire
summary: Kohler Co. is celebrating its 150th anniversary with a year-long Heritage Colors campaign. The campaign features six vintage colorways from the Kohler archives, and consumers can vote for their favorite two colors, which will be featured in a limited-edition product collection. Kohler is also hosting events in New York City with pop-up trucks, special chocolate, and Kohler product giveaways.
